quote: But a mist would go up from the earth, and it watered the entire surface of the ground.
When she opened it, she saw the child, and the boy was crying. She felt compassion for him, but she said: “This is one of the children of the Hebrews.”
the sons of Paʹhath-moʹab, of the sons of Jeshʹu·a and Joʹab, 2,812;
While they were there, the time came for her to give birth.
